Uses of Package
moulton.scalable.texts

Packages that use moulton.scalable.texts
Package Description
moulton.scalable.clickables
The clickables package contains classes that pertain to menu components that can be clicked.
moulton.scalable.texts
The texts package contains classes and menu components that ar primarily dedicated to holding and processing text for display in the menu.
  • Classes in moulton.scalable.texts used by moulton.scalable.clickables
    Class Description
    Alignment
    A simple enumeration to serve as the alignment of the text of a MenuComponent.
  • Classes in moulton.scalable.texts used by moulton.scalable.texts
    Class Description
    Alignment
    A simple enumeration to serve as the alignment of the text of a MenuComponent.
    HotkeyTextComponent
    Implementations of HotkeyTextComponent are instances of Clickable that can react to the hotkey commands of "copy", "cut", "paste", and "select all".
    LineBreak
    The Line Break class serves as a utility for text based classes, such as the TextHistory and the TextBox.
    TextBox
    This is a text box that users can enter data into, the available characters for which is defined by TextFormat.
    TextFormat
    A utility class to format text.
    TextInputComponent
    Implementations of HotkeyTextComponent are instances of Clickable that receive text input from the MenuManager through the TextInputComponent.appendMessage(String) and TextInputComponent.removeMessage(int).
